list_definition.definition: a mark left, especially a footprint etc
(also racetrack) a course on which runners, cyclists etc race

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: (also adjective) the 100 metres sprint and other track events.

list_definition.definition: to follow (eg an animal) by the marks, footprints etc that it has left

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They tracked the wolf to its lair.
